name: Slime Man
description:
Slime Man needs your help! He's been transported to a disgustingly green alternate dimension and he's been starving for DAYS. His species, the Slimeorpheis, can only sustain themselves off of cupcakes. What ever shall he do- Is that? A. It can't be. A cupcake?! Go get it!

The super sweet controls:
A (or left arrow key): Left
D (or right arrow key): Right
Space Bar: Jump  (you can also double jump on walls**!!)
**very important mechanic
